title: Tiramisu with Amaretti Biscuits
directions: How to make the Amaretti Tiramisu
1. First mix the egg yolks with the sugar
2. Add the mascarpone cheese and the rum, and continue to blend until you get a dense cream
3. Beat the egg whites and add them gently to the cream
4. Boil the milk in a small pot with a piece of vanilla bean, remove from heat and melt the chopped chocolate in it, mixing well with a whisk.

5. Assemble the cake directly into individual bowls or using a dish for desserts, making a first layer with some of the mascarpone cream and amaretti soaked into the chocolate milk, cover with another layer of cream and a sprinkling of cocoa powder, then another layer of amaretti, cream and finally sprinkle with cocoa.
Let the tiramisu rest for a few hours in the refrigerator before serving.
It is simply an amazing dessert with Amaretti!
ingredients: Ingredients to make the Tiramisu with Amaretti, serving about 8
